definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: He says there was regular information-sharing between the mills and their suppliers that benefited both sides.
sentences.chinese: 他談到鋼鐵企業和供貨商經常信息共享，雙方獲益。

sentences.english: Report the examined and approved qualified suppliers list of this project to company for record.
sentences.chinese: 將本項目審定合格的供貨商名單報公司備案。

sentences.english: IDEAL supplies zippers to the leading apparel brands and retailers in the USA and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 理想拉鍊集團是衆多歐美頂級衣履品牌之拉鍊供貨商。

sentences.english: " Android's success can be attributed to "communication service providers' marketing and vendor support," Gartner said.
sentences.chinese: 而安卓的成功則要歸功於運營商和供貨商的支持。

sentences.english: make sure the company which, well,  the vendor is doing a good job,
sentences.chinese: 確保公司，供貨商的工作做到位。

sentences.english: Fairchild Semiconductor (NYSE:FCS) is the leading global supplier of high-performance power products.
sentences.chinese: 飛兆半導體是全球首屈一指的高性能功率產品供貨商。

sentences.english: And we， on our part， shall not handle competitive products offered by other suppliers either.
sentences.chinese: 當然我們也不能經營其他供貨商提供的競爭性產品。

sentences.english: Tray vendor shall be responsible for detailed tray design including downcomers.
sentences.chinese: 塔盤供貨商應對塔盤，包括降液管的詳細設計負責。

sentences.english: The market was thrown open to any supplier to compete for contracts.
sentences.chinese: 市場放開，任何供貨商都可競爭承包合同。

sentences.english: Then you can make a wise decision about who deserves the contract.
sentences.chinese: 然後你就能做出和那個供貨商籤合同的明智決定。

sentences.english: To control and coordinate maintenance work subcontracted to specialized companies.
sentences.chinese: 控制和協調與企業的外包供貨商的工作。

sentences.english: At the same time also like to order, let us be your most satisfied with the supplier.
sentences.chinese: 同時還可來樣訂單，讓我們成爲您最滿意的供貨商。

sentences.english: You need to find the best ecommerce web hosting provider for your website.
sentences.chinese: 你需要找到最好的電子商務網站的供貨商。

sentences.english: We have also supplied FEY lamilar ring (used in axle box) to Zhuzhou Electric Locomotive Works.
sentences.chinese: 同時我們也是株洲電力機車廠的軸箱密封圈的供貨商。

sentences.english: It's why Ive been trying to become one of those suppliers.
sentences.chinese: 這也是爲什麼我一直想打進那些供貨商的圈子。

sentences.english: Vendor shall provide digital readout tachometers with continuous readout.
sentences.chinese: 供貨商應該提供連續讀數的數字式轉速計。

definition: to sell/to sell on commission/to distribute
